ygData.subject: Level 55
ygData.msgSnippet: bard in my guild hit 55.  i guess i misunderstood the cap on parry being 75. he is currently at 55, and it had not gone up yet though he hadn t done much
ygData.messageBody:
bard in my guild hit 55. i guess i misunderstood the cap on parry being 75.
he is currently at 55, and it had not gone up yet though he hadn't done much
tanking so far since he levelled. his dodge is around 135. the level 55
bellow, supposedly which does 220DD and an 8 second stun, actually heals the
mob (i wish that was funny). the level 55 mana song heals for 11 points per
tick singing, and he has not tested the mana aspect yet. sounds like this
could be a rather good song with a Kelin's Lute (20+ heal per tick as well
as probably double clarity/mana song).

Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
